trans-unit.source: Hey, I am Stefan. I work on this app in my free time. If you like the app please consider supporting me so I can afford working on it in the future.
trans-unit.target: Hey, Ich bin Stefan. Ich arbeite in meiner Freizeit an dieser App. Wenn dir die App gefällt, würde ich mich über deine Unterstützung freuen, damit ich es mir leisten kann weiter an der App zu arbeiten.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Hey, I am Stefan. I work on this app in my free time. If you like the app please consider supporting me so I can afford working on it in the future."; ObjectID = "5tC-JT-HAB";

trans-unit.source: Buy me a big icecream to support the future development of the app. I like stracciatella and strawberry.
trans-unit.target: Zahle mir einen großen Eisbecher und unterstütze so die weitere Entwicklung der App. Ich mag Stracciatella und Erbeere besonders gerne.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Buy me a big icecream to support the future development of the app. I like stracciatella and strawberry."; ObjectID = "7e4-bN-pFt";

trans-unit.source: Buy me a coffe to support the future development of the app. I prefer a cappuccino by the way.
trans-unit.target: Zahle mir einen Kaffe und unterstütze so die weitere Entwicklung der App. Cappuccino trinke ich am liebsten.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Buy me a coffe to support the future development of the app. I prefer a cappuccino by the way."; ObjectID = "68p-p3-Ups";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Open in your podcast app"; ObjectID = "A67-66-l8h";

trans-unit.source: You will receive push notifications if any of your favorite podcasts does a live show.
trans-unit.target: Du erhältst eine Push Benachrichtigung, sobald einer deiner Favoriten eine Livesendung startet.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "You will receive push notifications if any of your favorite podcasts does a live show."; ObjectID = "DWx-RP-Bf0";

trans-unit.source: This is a probably very long subtitle
trans-unit.target: This is a probably very long subtitle
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "This is a probably very long subtitle"; ObjectID = "MMC-P0-b9z";

trans-unit.source: Buy me a burger menu to support the future development of the app. I prefer Ketchup with my fries.
trans-unit.target: Zahle mir ein großes Burger Menü und unterstütze so die weitere Entwicklung der App. Cheeseburger esse ich am liebsten.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Buy me a burger menu to support the future development of the app. I prefer Ketchup with my fries."; ObjectID = "SOX-Wq-9A4";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Report a bug on Github"; ObjectID = "ZDd-88-y9e";
this message gets displayed if add favorites table view controller does not have any item to display

trans-unit.source: This is a filtered event list. You only see events of your favorite shows here. Currently there are no events of your favorite podcasts scheduled.
trans-unit.note: this message gets displayed if the user filters the event tableview to only show favorites, but there are not events to display.
trans-unit.target: Das ist eine gefilterte Event Liste. Hier sind nur Events deiner Favoriten zu sehen. Momentan ist kein Event eines deiner Favoriten geplant.

trans-unit.source: Did not receive any upcoming events. Pull to refresh to try again.
trans-unit.note: this message gets displayed if no events could be displayed / fetched from the API
trans-unit.target: Es konnten keine Events geladen werden. Pull to refresh, um neu zu laden.

trans-unit.note: section header in event table view for the later than next week section
section header in event table view for the live now section
section header in event table view for the later this week section
section header in event table view for the upcoming today section
section header in event table view for the tomorrow section

trans-unit.source: Add podcast shows as your favorite to see them here.
trans-unit.note: this message is displayed if no podcast has been added as a favorite and the favorites table view is empty.
trans-unit.target: Markiere Podcasts als deine Favoriten, um sie hier zu sehen.

trans-unit.note: If the user tried to sent an email and it could not be sent an alert view does show the error message. this is the title of the alert view popup

trans-unit.source: The selected stream can not be played.
trans-unit.note: If a stream can not be played and the player goes to failed state this error message alert view will be displayed. this is the message.
trans-unit.target: Dieser Livestream kann nicht abgespielt werden.

trans-unit.note: If a stream can not be played and the player goes to failed state this error message alert view will be displayed. this is the title.
long pressing in the player view shows an action sheet to end playback. this is the action message to end playback.
mail body for a new feedback mail message
the user can send a feedback mail to the podcast. this is the preset mail title.

trans-unit.source: Your device is not setup to send email.
trans-unit.note: the message shown to the user in an alert view if his device is not setup to send email
when the user clicks on the podcast subscribe button an alert view opens to choose a podcast client. this is the message of the alert view.
remove a favorite by swiping left to edit

trans-unit.source:
Please try to explain your problem as detailed as possible, so we can find the best solution for your problem faster.
%@
trans-unit.note: mail body for a new support mail message
trans-unit.target: Bitte versuche dein Problem so genau wie möglich zu beschreiben, damit wir schnell eine Lösung dafür finden können. %@

trans-unit.source: Your device is not setup to send email.
trans-unit.note: the message shown to the user in an alert view if his device is not setup to send email
mail title for a new support mail message

trans-unit.source: Double Tap to search through all podcasts and add favorites
trans-unit.target: doppel tap um alle podcasts zu durchsuchen und als favorit zu markieren

trans-unit.source: double tap to skip 30 seconds backward
trans-unit.target: doppel tap um 30 sekunden zurück zu springen

trans-unit.source: Double Tap to toggle date display or days left display.
trans-unit.target: doppel tap um zwischen datum und countdown zu wechseln

trans-unit.source: double tap to skip 30 seconds forward
Double Tap to toggle date display or days left display.
trans-unit.target: doppel tap um zwischen datum und countdown zu wechseln

trans-unit.source: Double Tap to configure a sleep timer
trans-unit.target: doppel tap um einen sleep timer einzurichten

trans-unit.source: Double Tap to disable the sleep timer
trans-unit.target: doppel tap um den sleep timer zu deaktivieren
